remarks: The only nonempty clopen set of a connected topology is the whole space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
statement:
iscon.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
conclo.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. Con ) $.
conclo.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. J ) $.
conclo.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
conclo.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) $.
conclo $p |- ( ph -> A = X ) $.
